response.overview: 1320Video returns for its 8th year to the Texas Streets for another week full of CRAZY street racing. Hundreds of streetcars show up once a year to prove that they have what it takes to get down at the "SUPER BOWL of Street Racing". This year was exceptionally hard for the competitors to accomplish any racing due to a massive increase of police presence during the street race marathon. Regardless, there was still PLENTY of action to be had, but at the cost of several arrests, speeding tickets, and police chases.  1320Video brings you this ACTION-PACKED movie with over 100 Street races that we documented during our favorite event  of the year
response.title: Texas Streets: LOCKDOWN
